about_the_game:
With the Deluxe Edition you will be able to progress faster in The Land of Magic! It offers several virtual currencies and two different cosmetic equipment items. Show off your skills in Worlds and other modes and show off your new looks!

The Deluxe Edition also includes:

  • +2500 Magic Thaler for buying more cosmetic items or other things.

  • +10 Amethysts for the purchase of a Season Star or cosmetic items or other things.

  • +5 tickets to convert or trade for other virtual currencies at the merchant in the store.

  • +12000 experience for your ghost journey.

  • Two new cosmetic equipment items: the magic wand, for dressing your ghost as a decoration, and the party hat, for dressing your ghost on the head, which also has special effects when the ghost walks.

  • BONUS: A season star to unlock several rewards in the ghost journey and receive explicit benefits such as: shorter waiting times, special rewards and more tasks. Important: if you already have a season star for this season, this bonus will be unlocked in the next season!

The edition will be regularly updated and improved with more content and items.
